pages.text: $(li)The Bottle o' Enchanting contain a strange magic inside.$(br)$(li)It can be thrown to the ground to generate Experience Orbs that you can absorb to earn Experience and level up.$(br)$(li)This experience can be used in an Enchanting Table or in an Anvil too.
$(li)Those Bottles can be found in Loot Chests.$(br)$(li)Hungers may drop them on death.$(br)$(li)Clerics will exchange them by Emeralds too.
